item.title: Simulation Study in R - in progress
item.description: This is a quick note for how to run some simulations in R, using the basic built-in function (or some package) is the easiest and obvious choice, using rstan for simple simulation is worthless but maybe useful when you need to simulate more complicated samples. 1. Using built-in function from R plot(hist(rnorm(1000))) 2. Using from Stan 2.1 Using only rstan 2.2 Using rstansim
